casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

94-1287. State v. Bryner.

Lorain County, Nos. 93CA005577 and 93CA005578. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for stay of execution of sentence pending appeal and continuance of bond,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and the same is hereby, denied, effective June 27, 1994.

A.W. Sweeney and Douglas, JJ., dissent.
